Package com.cloudant.sync.datastore

Interface Summary
ConflictResolver Interface to implement conflicts resolving algorithm.
Datastore The Datastore is the core interaction point for create, delete and update operations (CRUD) for within Cloudant Sync.
DatastoreExtended DatastoreExtended adds further, lesser-used methods to the Datastore interface.
DocumentBody Interface for DocumentRevisionTree body.
DocumentRevision A single revision of a document within a datastore.
 

Class Summary
Changes Changes objects describe a list of changes to the datastore.
DatastoreManager Manages a set of Datastore objects, with their underlying disk storage residing in a given directory.
DocumentBodyFactory Factory class to create DocumentBody objects from either JSON byte-streams or java Map objects.
DocumentRevisionBuilder Build DocumentRevisions in a chained manner.
DocumentRevisionTree Describes the document tree for a single document within the datastore.
DocumentRevisionTree.DocumentRevisionNode A node in a document's revision tree history.
DocumentRevsList List of DocumentRevs.
DocumentRevsUtils  
RevisionHistoryHelper Methods to help managing document revision histories.
 

Exception Summary
ConflictException Thrown when there is a conflict updating a datastore, for example trying to update a document but passing in an incorrect revision ID.
DatabaseNotCreatedException Thrown when there is a problem creating a new datastore.
DocumentNotFoundException Thrown when a document cannot be found.
